EXTRACTED VALUE: "[A] rich and complex read, in which tense, reference and time shift at a speed that rewards patience."
"The poem/novel ends with only a trace of hope; there are no pat endings, but a glimpse of beauty wrought from brutal reality."
"Bright with watercolor washes, the cartoon-like ink drawings ensure the book's immediate appeal...A hysterical tail--er, tale."
"I set out not to 'write a tragedy' in this play, but to show the truth as I saw it."
